price: A kò ṣẹ̀dá àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀, àti ohunkóhun tó wà láààrin méjèèjì bí kò ṣe pẹ̀lú òdodo àti fún gbèdéke àkókò kan. Àwọn tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́ yó sì máa gbúnrí kúrò níbi ohun tí A fi ṣèkìlọ̀ fún wọn.
arabic: مَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَمَّآ أُنذِرُواْ مُعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: mā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā illā bil-ḥaqi wa-ajalin musamman wa-alladhīna kafarū ʿammā undhirū muʿ'riḍūna
